posts.text:
Being an international student in the US is both exciting and terrifying 🌍

From navigating cultural shocks to figuring out networking, job applications, and even visa processes.

That’s why I loved this conversation withon the ‘0 to 1’ podcast.

We dove into:

➡️ Moving from India to the US

➡️ The secrets to securing the O-1 visa

➡️ Why networking plays such a big role

➡️ How to make cold messages stand out

➡️ Advice for international students looking to differentiate themselves in applications

➡️ Writing books & building community along the way

This episode is packed with insights and practical advice!

📺 Watch on YouTube:

🎧 Listen to audio:
